workflow.description:
If errors are encountered, this workflow will send an email alert and then wait a specified amoung of time before allowing the VM to be destroyed. This wait time is specified in the following Configuration Element: Provisioning -> waitOnErrorBeforeDisposing
If you set this wait time above 20 minutes or so, be sure to increase the timeout for MachineProvisioned in 2 places: 1) Any Event Subscriptions for MachineProvisioned (blank = unlimited) 2) The IaaS server's ManagerService.exe.config file (default = 30 min)
Instructions for updating the IaaS server's ManagerService.exe.config are here: https://pubs.vmware.com/vra-70/index.jsp?topic=%2Fcom.vmware.vra.extensibility.doc%2FGUID-246CD2CE-0940-40C9-B813-8510C4DC6A3F.html
